name: Lexcel Solutions
overview: Lexcel Solutions, Inc. provides payment testing software and services for network pre-certification and validation applications. It offers Lexcel TestSystem ATM, an ATM testing solution for generating transactions, validating transaction content, viewing load files, and regression testing ATM systems; and Point of Sale Testing, a solution that performs testing, speeds the process of terminal development for terminal manufacturers, and decreases the certification and implementation procedure for processors utilizing new terminals. The company also provides Lexcel TestSystem Network, a transaction processing platform that queues transactions and manages various transactions in-flight; and Clearing software virtualizes the management and testing of clearing processes creating an automated repeatable clearing environment. In addition, it offers Lexcel TestSystem Settlement, a PC-based software application that virtualizes a payment networkâ€™s back office processing logic and message settlement formats; and Lexcel TestSystem CapSystem, a capacity planning solution to manage transaction processing for performance, stress, and capacity testing in the payment technology industry. Further, the company provides planning, implementation, maintenance, on-site system installation, training, integration, project management, and capacity planning services. It serves third-party transaction processors, debit and credit networks, financial institutions, retailers, ATM/POS manufacturers, and government organizations in North and South America, and Europe. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona. As of June 29, 2011, Lexcel Solutions, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Clear2Pay nv/sa.

acquisition.source_description: Clear2Pay Acquires Lexcel (US) to Widen Global Footprint and Strengthen Portfolio of Test Solutions
